description: I used HTTrack for years on Windows. Recently switched to Kubuntu and it doesn't launch. Sadly, I have to look for something else.

This is an amazing software.
Very powerful and useful to archive offline and review every page of the targeted site.
Best is that no squigly wigly ads wasting time and bandwidth!!
summary: OMG_Just what I have been looking for!!

description: Ubuntu software have 2 Webhttrack apps. Which one should I pick ??
Does not open..newer version isn't working as used to earlier kindly devs
I've tried using HTTrack on other platforms without much luck. However, this app was easy to use and worked flawlessly. Much appreciated.
Many time i installed it, and many times too this appp was gone

I use this program to mirror sites that have free sheetmusic. It downloads the entire site with all of the html, pdf, jpg, png, tiff, etc. files and puts the structure in a folder on my local drive. So all I have to do is open the Index.html for that site in a browser and it's like I am on that site, but all of the files are on my drive!

Doesn't start, unusable. Yet another example how useless Ubuntu's app store is compared to apt. Save your time by installing it the reliable way: 
apt install httrack
summary: another great utility rendered useless by app store

description:
He usado programas para descargar páginas, pero esta para mi ocupa el segundo lugar. No la he usado, en esta nueva descarga, pero hace ya mucho tiempo que no la uso. 

La voy a utilizar más adelante y puede que cambie mi postura en cuanto a su desempeño.
summary: No es la mejor del mundo
